data.title: MISSION
data.body: A vibrant and nurturing Polytechnic Service College for transforming lives and communities.

data.title: VISION
data.body: To improve the lives of people and communities through quality instruction, innovations, productivity initiatives, environment and industry-feasible technologies, resource mobilization and transformation outreach programs and services.

data.title: ISPSC MOTTO
data.body: Taking the lead... Our trademark for Globalization

data.title: PHILOSOPHY
data.body: Flourish ISPSC, Deliver Quality Education and Services And Launch Academic Excellence

data.title: GOALS AND OBJECTIVES
data.body: To effectively realize the VISION and MISSION, the College will have the following goals & objectives
data.text: To be the source of competent and employable technical and professional graduates for domestic and foreign markets through quality instruction;
data.text1: To disseminate products of researches (e.g. matured and environment- friendly technologies and others) to entrepreneurs, farmers and fisher folks to improve/increase their income;
data.text2: To help alleviate poverty and improve the quality of the lives of poor and marginalized families in the service areas through relevant extension services; To strengthen production and generate more income to support research, instruction & extension activities; and To improve physical facilities and building structures in all of the campuses.
